input_text.Prompt:
Using the product specifications and product name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product name:
Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat (Extra Large)

Product specifications:
Measures 30" x 48"
Made of coir coco palm fiber and painted using fade resistant enamel paints
Simply vacuum or hose down to clean

Product description:
Welcome guests to your home in style
Features colorful poppies
input_text.Response A:
Attention: "Transform Your Entrance with the Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat (Extra Large) - A Stunning Welcome Mat for Your Home!"

Interest: "Elevate your home's curb appeal and create a lasting first impression with our beautifully crafted coir doormat. Measuring 30" x 48", it's the perfect size to greet guests and add a pop of color to your entranceway. Made from high-quality coir coco palm fiber and painted with fade-resistant enamel paints, this doormat is both durable and stylish."

Desire: "Imagine the delight on your visitors' faces as they step onto this vibrant, colorful doormat, featuring stunning poppies. Not only will it add warmth and personality to your home's exterior, but it will also provide a practical and easy-to-clean solution for keeping your entranceway clean and free of dirt and debris. Plus, with its extra-large size, it can comfortably accommodate multiple guests and provide a comfortable, cushioned surface for them to wipe their feet."

Action: "Don't settle for a boring, generic doormat - upgrade to the Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat (Extra Large) today and make a statement of style and sophistication. Order now and elevate your home's entrance to the next level!"
